name: takenotes
description: A modern note-taking application with Vue.js frontend and Node.js backend

scripts.dev:debug: concurrently --names "backend,frontend" --prefix-colors "blue,green" --kill-others --raw "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.clean: rm -rf backend/node_modules frontend/node_modules backend/dist frontend/.nuxt frontend/.output
scripts.clean:install: npm run clean && npm run install:all
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend

author: Le Quoc Trang - Cursor
